channel.title: i Need help!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "i Need help!"

item.title: Re: i Need help!
item.content:encoded: On the main menu, there's a button up top (near the special mission / exam button) that says "Spar with a Friend." That's where you go to spar. You need to ask other people to be on your list. Once they agree, they add you to their list and you add them to yours (both sides must do this, and there's no confirmation sent to either side). After that, once per day you can fight with everyone on your list.

item.title: i Need help!
